nodes.bodyText: Is the last character of new line correct?
Is the last character of new line correct?
May I ask you a naming improvement? I think 'dtCellValue52' is actually more like 'ruleNameValue52'? What is your opinion?
actually is 739 already, but is probably fine as we are not adding other updater simultaneously in other PR.
